title: Coinbase says recent data breach impacts 69,461 customers
summary: Coinbase, a cryptocurrency exchange with over 100 million customers, revealed that a recent data breach in which cybercriminals stole customer and corporate data affected 69,461 individuals [...]

title: Google Chrome Can Now Auto-Change Compromised Passwords Using Its Built-In Manager
summary:
Google has announced a new feature in its Chrome browser that lets its built-in Password Manager automatically change a user's password when it detects the credentials to be compromised.

title: PowerSchool hacker pleads guilty to student data extortion scheme
summary: A 19-year-old college student from Worcester, Massachusetts, has agreed to plead guilty to a massive cyberattack on PowerSchool that extorted millions of dollars in exchange for not leaking the personal data of millions of students and teachers. [...]
